title: Inland Empire

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may Dream, choosing a player. If no one visits you, you give that player a nightmare, framing them tonight and blackmailing them the next day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, you appear innocent. In addition to your night action, you may also give a player a nightmare, framing and blackmailing them, regardless if anyone visits you or not.
Kill Note Addition:
*"I've seen them in my dreams. They were walking around my mind, trying to find something in it. Trying to find me."*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4917
*Hunches and gut feelings. Dreams, thoughts, and voices unchained, giving advice to their emperor. Talk to inanimate objects.*
